text: The habit of despair is worse than despair itself.
author: Albert Camus

text: Smart people are often cruel. Stupid people are cruel beyond measure.
author: Jack London

text: Man is the only creature who refuses to be what he is.
author: Albert Camus

text: What is called a reason for living is also an excellent reason for dying.
author: Albert Camus

text: Then you travel around and live in different places and you realise that youve got it the wrong way round
author: Irvin Welsh

text: It's a mystery to me why people demand meaningfulness from art, while realizing that there is no meaning in life itself.
author: David Lynch

text: History is the best teacher, who has the worst students
author: Indira Gandhi

text: What we know is a drop, what we don't know is an ocean.
author: Isaac Newton

text: It is always worth starting with something that sows doubt.
author: Boris Strugatsky

text: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone else's life.
author: Steve Jobs

author: Johann Wolfgang Goethe

text: I would rather be certain of a good result than hopeful of a great one.
author: Warren Buffett

text: If the wind will not serve, take to the oars.
author: Latin Proverb
